## Select by Location

One of the most commonly used operations in ArcGIS pro is the process of selecting features of spatial object (layer) based on whether or not these relate spatially to another object (layer). This process is also referred as _spatial subsetting_ and in ArcGIS pro can be preformed in various ways using the __Select by Location__ tool. 

Respectively, in __R__ the same operation is, on a first level, performed using the _square bracket ([])_ operator within the base R package.
